content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
-  Stone furnace has status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0) 
-  Stone furnace has status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5) with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668) with status EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a constant fuel supply to maintain their status as EntityStatus.WORKING.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to prevent EntityStatus.NO_FUEL errors.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the rest of the electricity network to maintain their status as EntityStatus.WORKING.
- Regularly check the connection status of entities to prevent EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED errors.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have a constant supply of ingredients to maintain their status as EntityStatus.WORKING.
- Regularly check the ingredient status of entities to prevent EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS errors.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network to maintain their status as EntityStatus.WORKING.
- Regularly check the plug status of entities to prevent EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK errors.

### Errors when entities have no source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a constant supply of source items to maintain their status as EntityStatus.WORKING.
- Regularly check the source item status of entities to prevent EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS errors.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
